text: NBF Islamic is the Sharia-compliant banking division of the National Bank of Fujairah (NBF), a financial institution in the United Arab Emirates (UAE). Established to provide banking services that adhere to Islamic principles. https://www.khaleejtimes.com/local-business/national-bank-of-fujairah- launches-islamic-banking == Business services == NBF Islamic offerings include: * Personal Banking: Services such as current accounts, savings accounts, and personal finance solutions designed in compliance with Sharia law. https://gulfnews.com/business/banking/national-bank-of-fujairah-launches- islamic-banking-1.1393007 * Business Banking: Sharia-compliant financing options, including business accounts and investment solutions, catering to the needs of SMEs and corporate clients. * Digital Banking: Online platforms that provide customers with access to their accounts and banking services. == Commitment to Sharia compliance == NBF Islamic operates under the guidance of the Sharia Supervisory Board comprising of Dr. Mohamed Ali Elgari (Chairman), Dr. Muhammedd Daud Bakar, Dr. Muhammad Amin Ali Qattan and Dr Osama Al Dereai ensuring that all products and services comply with Islamic banking principles.https://gulfbusiness.com/national-bank-fujairah-launches-new- islamic-unit/ == References == == Other websites == * National Bank of Fujairah * Islamic Banking in the UAE Category:Banks
title: NBF Islamic
